LanguageData.BestApparel.Control.UseAllThings.Tooltip: Do search things in the whole game
LanguageData.BestApparel.Control.UseCraftableThings.T: Do search things only in available workbenches bills
LanguageData.BestApparel.Btn.Resort.Tooltip: Closing this window also resorts the results.
LanguageData.BestApparel.Label.Columns.Tooltip: Which columns should be displayed in the table
LanguageData.BestApparel.Label.Sorting.Tooltip: Only those stats that are selected in the columns window are displayed here. The slider indicates how high priority (or valuable) this stat is. Stats that have a higher value in smaller values should be inverted. Value '-10' totally excludes stat from sorting.
LanguageData.BestApparel.FilterType.Layer.Tooltip: Apparel body layer filter: If have any 'ON' state - the thing should contain ALL of it. If have any 'OFF' state - the thing should NOT contain it.
LanguageData.BestApparel.FilterType.BodyPart.Tooltip: Apparel body layer filter: If have any 'ON' state - the thing should contain ALL of it. If have any 'OFF' state - the thing should NOT contain it.
LanguageData.BestApparel.FilterType.Category.Tooltip: Thing categoty filter: If have any 'ON' state - the thing should contain ALL of it. If have any 'OFF' state - the thing should NOT contain it.
LanguageData.BestApparel.FilterType.Stuff.Tooltip: Filter by the material from which it can be made: If have any 'ON' state - only things that can be made from it will be displayed. If have any 'OFF' state - only things that can NOT be made from it will be displayed.
LanguageData.BestApparel.FilterType.WeaponClass: If have any 'ON' state - the thing should contain ALL of it. If have any 'OFF' state - the thing should NOT contain it.
LanguageData.BestApparel.WindowTitle.Fitting.Tooltip: This window allows you to fit things on a pawn. The left panel shows all the parts of the pawn's body, each part can be covered with several layers. The right panel shows all the things that you can create, or all the things at all. If a part of the body and a layer are occupied, the item will not be displayed. If you select a body part on the left, then only those things that can be placed on the selected body part will be displayed on the right. Yellow - free slot, gray - occupied slot. Sorting in the right panel affected by columns and sorting rules selected in the main window.
LanguageData.BestApparel.Fitting.Button.RemoveAll.Too: Remove all items from this slots and all slots that item covers
LanguageData.BestApparel.Tip.Fitting.SlotOccupied.Too: Adding this item will remove something else
